name: part_003
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE3【チラ見せ】 [3OkprzHcirU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Promotional segment for BANDAI SPIRITS featuring Ichiban Kuji and crane game prizes.
Announcement for 'The Last Frontier' scale figure project featuring AZKi and Hoshimachi Suisei.
Promotional segment for FuRyu prize plushies and figures.
Promotional segment for UNDONE x hololive SUPER EXPO 2025 collaboration watches.
Promotional segment for iPASS featuring limited edition blind bags.
JOYSOUND X1 commercial featuring an energetic male lead and a promotional song.
TAITO promotional segment for the 'Doqute' jumbo plushie series.
Announcement for the new 'Groove Coaster' game featuring hololive characters.
KONAMI promotional segment featuring various arcade game collaborations.
GiGO promotional segment showing people enjoying arcade games.
Promotional segment for PalVerse mini figures.
Promotional segment for Design COCO scale figures.
Promotional segment for Meiri Shurui collaboration drinks.
Announcement for the STREET FIGHTER 6 x hololive collaboration cafe and prizes.
Showcase of fan messages and illustrations for hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony.

subtitles.original: ホロライブエキスポ2025限定の、
subtitles.english: Exclusive to hololive EXPO 2025,

subtitles.original: 一番くじ特設フォトブースも展開中。
subtitles.english: the Ichiban Kuji special photo booth is also now open.

subtitles.original: モニターをタッチしてクジ券をめくり、
subtitles.english: You can touch the monitor to reveal a lottery ticket

subtitles.original: 出てきたデザインと一緒に撮影できます。
subtitles.english: and take a photo with the design that appears.

subtitles.original: The Last Frontier
subtitles.english: The Last Frontier

subtitles.original: …して 捧げる歌を…
subtitles.english: ...and offer this song...

subtitles.original: …もう一度…
subtitles.english: ...once more...

subtitles.original: フィギュア化決定！
subtitles.english: Figure project decided!

subtitles.original: 響け 空の彼方へ…
subtitles.english: Resonate to the far side of the sky...

subtitles.original: 支え合いたい The Last Frontier
subtitles.english: I want to support you, The Last Frontier

subtitles.original: フリューから『ホロライブ』プライズが全国アミューズメント施設にて続々展開中！
subtitles.english: hololive prizes from FuRyu are rolling out to amusement centers nationwide!

subtitles.original: 4月からは新たにひっかけフィギュアも登場！
subtitles.english: New 'Hikkake' figures are also coming in April!

subtitles.original: 90人のhololiveとHOLOSTARSタレントから好きな1人を選ぼう！
subtitles.english: Pick your favorite from 90 hololive and HOLOSTARS talents!

subtitles.original: 3月8日より先行予約開始
subtitles.english: Pre-orders start March 8th

subtitles.original: 台湾旅行中、最も便利な決済サービスを提供します。
subtitles.english: We provide the most convenient payment service for your trip to Taiwan.

subtitles.original: 新商品まもなく登場！
subtitles.english: New products coming soon!

subtitles.original: 歌いたい曲が入っていなかった…
subtitles.english: The song I wanted to sing wasn't there...

subtitles.original: だったら！
subtitles.english: In that case!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1で歌おうぜ！
subtitles.english: Let's sing it on JOYSOUND X1!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1 オンデマンド！
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1 On-demand!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1 曲数No.1！
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1, number one in song count!

subtitles.original: AIが採点 絶賛 カラオケ最高！
subtitles.english: AI scoring is great, karaoke is the best!

subtitles.original: 曲数No.1 歌いたい曲があるって最高！
subtitles.english: Ranked #1 for song variety! It's the best to have the songs you want to sing!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1

subtitles.original: タイトー！
subtitles.english: Taito!

subtitles.original: 超特大ぬいぐるみブランド『どきゅーと』から商品化決定！
subtitles.english: Announcement: Plushies from the jumbo brand 'Doqute' are coming!

subtitles.original: 約100cmサイズぬいぐるみに！
subtitles.english: They'll be massive, roughly 100cm plushies!

subtitles.original: 2025年夏受注開始予定！
subtitles.english: Orders are scheduled to start in Summer 2025!

subtitles.original: タイトー！
subtitles.english: Taito!

subtitles.original: グルーヴコースター最新作に、白上フブキと、
subtitles.english: In the latest Groove Coaster, Shirakami Fubuki and,

subtitles.original: さくらみこが、キャラクターボイスで参戦！
subtitles.english: Sakura Miko join with character voices!

subtitles.original: 人気曲や、私たちが歌う曲も楽しめる！
subtitles.english: Enjoy popular tracks and songs sung by us!

subtitles.original: 私たちが、グルーヴワールドをナビゲートするよ！
subtitles.english: We'll be your guides to the Groove World!

subtitles.original: …もっともっと夢を追いかけたい
subtitles.english: ...I want to chase my dreams more and more

subtitles.original: ワクワクとまらない 想像を超えてく…
subtitles.english: The excitement won't stop, exceeding my imagination...

subtitles.original: …世界に見せてあげる
subtitles.english: ...I'll show the whole world

subtitles.original: コナミ！
subtitles.english: Konami!

subtitles.original: ゲームのオアシスに飛び込め！
subtitles.english: Dive into the oasis of gaming!

subtitles.original: 推しの夢叶えます。
subtitles.english: Making your oshi's dreams come true.

subtitles.original: 特報
subtitles.english: Special News

subtitles.original: 2025年夏 コラボカフェ・プライズ開催決定
subtitles.english: Collab cafe and prizes coming in Summer 2025

subtitles.original: Color Rise Harmony
subtitles.english: Color Rise Harmony
